website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a versatile engineering toy that's practical for kids of different ages, this is the one to get – features STEM-based projects that are as fun as they are educational.
pros: Suitable for kids age 5 and up with a variety of brightly-colored components that fit together in numerous ways
101 pieces for STEM-based projects adaptable for all ages, from beginners to intermediate to advanced
cons: There's a learning curve to using the tools and screws
Some parents may prefer printed instructions instead of the ebook access

customer_reviews.title: Great construction set
customer_reviews.text: Great construction set. My 3 3⁄4 years old grandson assembled several animals pretty fast and really liked working with the wrench, assembling and de-assmbling. The pieces are quite large making it easy for little hands to build.I took a star off for the e-book. It says the e-book is enclosed but you really have to hunt for it on the manufacturer website. Wouldn't it be nice if there was a booklet of instructions enclosed just like in the lego sets? I printed close to 90 pages and put them in the binder with dividers and labels for each creature but it took quite a bit of work.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet and Salty

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, not so great price!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for Christmas when my son was just under 3. He loves them! He's almost 5 and still plays with them for hours. A few suggestions... 1.make the container a little bigger so that it's easier for the kids to put away all the parts. 2. Lower then price! Although it's a great toy the cost to make it can't be much. These are pretty expensive for a bunch of plastic parts. I might you'd sell more if they were more affordable. 3. Add a place on the lid where the "tool" can fit. It often gets misplaced.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: A DISAPPOINTMENT
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old grandson was all excited to build lots of things with this set, but the pieces do not hold together well. They loosen quickly and the robot or animal he has built won't stand up for more than a minute without collapsing. Also the little "wrench" included in the set does not do anything except make a rachet sound; it does not tighten or loosen the nuts. Very disappointed, especially for the high price.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma of 4

customer_reviews.title: Used?
customer_reviews.text: This toy is not boxed, it came in the plastic bin with scratches and black marks. Pieces inside are not in neat order. There are loose papers on top of pieces, look Used. For this price, I’d expect better. Stuck with giving this as a gift tonight, otherwise would return.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Unisex Toy that Encourages Creativity
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old granddaughter loved this toy! I had created one of the toys as an example of what you can make with this set of building blocks. She was so excited and immediately started to make her own toys. The picture instructions were easy for her to follow and eventually she just started to create her own toys. This is an exceptional learning tool.!
customer_reviews.author: KBK

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME LEARNING TOY!
customer_reviews.text: I’m usually skeptical making purchases without physical seeing/touching the item because you never know what the quality is going to be like. Let me tell you, this product is amazing! All of the pieces are made of sturdy plastic. You don’t have to worry about it breaking/denting or coming apart. The bolts and screws have their purpose along with the wrenches and they actually work! This is such an incredible learning activity I am so happy with this purchase and this company!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: great gift for a builder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew who is really into building things and loves legos but I was not willing to spend that kind of money knowing he would lose half the pieces! This was a great set and he opened it right up to start building things and putting them together. He loved that it came with "tools" to tighten the nuts and bolts. I love that is comes in it's own sturdy box with a handle so he can easily transport it.
customer_reviews.author: BuckeyeMoJo

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the pieces very much. I can't wait to give this to my nephew on his birthday. I'm planning to download the e-book on his tablet, so he can have access to the building ideas anytime. The case is a plus, since it can be used as a table where he can assemble the pieces if he is sitting on the floor. Update: My nephew loved it. Just one suggestion, the case needs to be a little bigger. The pieces doesn't fit in when a kid gathers them up after playing, they need to be carefully arranged in order to fit in. That's a little frustrating for a young kid who wants to "clean" after playing.
customer_reviews.author: Clary

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My almost 4 year old grandson loves this. This was a surprise for him as his family has to shelter in place. I was so happy that he enjoyed it, but here's the best thing, so do his parents! My son-in-law, an engineer even wrote to thank me for sending this to his son. I have so say that this is a great company! They really want to produce a quality STEM product.
customer_reviews.author: ETH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toy for 4 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect holiday gift for my almost 4 yr old son. He loved playing with it the last couple days. I think this may be the next "magnatiles" and he will be obsessed with this toy the same way he was obsessed with magnas. The size of the parts are perfect for little fingers. If buying again I would opt for the bigger set with more pieces, you use them faster than you realize especially if playing together or if there are multiple kids playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy C

customer_reviews.title: Nice set.
customer_reviews.text: This is an update to a previous review. This particular set does not come with a drill. There is another company that puts out similar Stem sets that does include a battery operated drill. My grandkids prefer using the drill to assemble and disassemble the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C.D.M.

customer_reviews.title: When he got them he was super excited. I had a blast playing with him ...
customer_reviews.text: I have never heard of these before but they looked cute for my 4 year old. When he got them he was super excited. I had a blast playing with him and building. The box comes with a booklet with suggested things to build or you can just use your imagination and build. The pieces are not small like Legos , so you do not have pieces everywhere. It also helps children with motorskills. This is a great toy for girls or boys. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Juice

customer_reviews.title: Excellent imaginative toy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this toy for a 4 year olds birthday. It was an immediate hit especially with his 5 year old cousin. He cried because he couldn't have it. We ordered a second one and it came the very next day! We made another little boy very happy to have his own building set! The shapes are colorful and perfect for little ones to use their imagination or follow the suggested building shapes with a little supervision ! It comes packaged in a great little box that is easy to open and keeps the blocks all together!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Lea Allison

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: it was a gift for my 3,5 year old son. He really liked it, but it is more suitable for little older kids I would say 4+. However, it could be just my son because he is more into kinetic sand/play doh/painting activities. He does enjoy building something with big LEGGO, so I thought he would enjoy this ETI Toy. I am still satisfied with the purchase and I am sure that my son eventually will play only with this toy. The time will come quite soon. Recommend this educational toy for every child!
customer_reviews.author: Bakus D

customer_reviews.title: christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: looks as pictured. the set comes in the storage container and fits but when i put it back in no matter how organized i could not close it without breaking the cover which i did do. the toy does what it advertises. my 4 and 5 year old boys never play with it. i wouldnt buy again
customer_reviews.author: amazonlover

customer_reviews.title: Make the container bigger!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and so does my daughter. My only issue and it’s a big one is the small container it comes in. Once you pull out pieces it’s nearly impossible to get them back in with the lid on. You have to arrange them just perfect or your not getting the lid back on. It’s kind of annoying spending more time getting the contents arranged just right than you spend playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: JustinA

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids who like to build!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 4yo daughter and put of the plethora of toys she's gotten, she has played with this toy nonstop. She's into building, but too young to use real tools, so this satisfies her need to build and is easy for little hands to use. Yes, sometimes screws come lose, but overall, excellent toy. I want to buy an additional, larger set so she can build more and build with friends.
customer_reviews.author: David Tran

customer_reviews.title: Super toy for 3 years and older
customer_reviews.text: Super toy for 3 years and older. This toy has a lot of things they can put together and take apart. Helps with logical thinking skills, hand dexterity, creativity. It is great to see how they put the pieces together and what they see in their finished masterpieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a very nice together time and is teaching him about nuts and ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 3 year old grandson for Christmas and he plays with it every time he is over at my home. It is a very nice together time and is teaching him about nuts and bolts and developing his imagination designing his own creations. Some of the suggested designs in the pictures don't exactly align with the nuts and bolts and you need to improvise a bit but overall very happy I bought it for him.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Exercise their minds! Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephews and it seemed to go over well. In an unrelated turn of events the youngest got frustrated and threw a temper tantrum, so be prepared for that. A good way to exercise the minds In a different way. All engineer dads out there will thrive over the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: breanna lyne

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: So excited to receive this toy for my grandson!! He loves to build & create & this is very well made so it will last for my infant granddaughters to use also in the future. I contact the company about a question that I had & received a reply that very day! They also checked back to be sure maybe question was answered ! Now that s Customerservice!! As grandmother & previous preschool teacher I am always looking for quality educational toys! I highly recommend this product! I can hardly wait for Christmas to give it to my grandson!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Cindy 19

customer_reviews.title: A toy that sparks creativity!
customer_reviews.text: I have four year old twin grandchildren, a boy and a girl, and they played with the first set of engineering blocks over Thanksgiving vacation. They loved them so much that they started to fight over the pieces.:-) As a result, I ordered another even larger set. They can't wait to come to play with them again. I love that these allow children to be imaginative and creative, a sign of a great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Lovemypets

customer_reviews.title: Great educational toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great educational toy for my 4 year old grandson. He enjoys playing with it, but needs supervision. As he gets older, I think this will be a great toy to teach him how to follow instructions and complete a project. I received an email with the instruction manual. I printed the instructions and put them in plastic sleeves in a binder so the pages would not rip. If you purchase this item and will be printing the instructions, be sure to have a full colored ink cartridge as there are many details pages.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT set! My toddler (who is three almost four) just loves this thing, honestly, the whole family does. There are so many cool different things that can be built, it is easy to use and easy to clean, it even comes in a great box to keep them in. Wonderful STEM set!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All three of my children love playing with these
customer_reviews.text: All three of my children love playing with these. They are 2,4 and 7 years old. One of the best toys I've ever bought them. My oldest son wanted to follow the pictures and create what he saw but my 4 year old created a van of his own imagination and my 2 year old loves learning how to use the little plastic screwdriver that comes with it. This is the perfect toy.
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most amazing finds. My 4 years old loves sitting down to make different things every time. It promotes creativity, encourages group play and strengthens attention span since it may take a bit longer to make more complicated objects. I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old nephew loves to build. I bought him this set for christmas. It was one of the first things he opened. He didn't want to open anything else after opening this. He wanted to play with it immediately. After all the presents were opened and cleaned up, he finally got to play with it and to this day my sister says he still plays with them everyday and builds the coolest stuff. Gives him the ability to build and use his imagination. Great toy for kids
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: loving it
customer_reviews.text: Grandson picked this above all the other toys received for his birthday, to play with first. He had the drawings and was putting things together and looking back and forth at the drawings. two of his other friends were also busy with this. It also meets my criteria for gifts when it comes to his mom and dad. It has to hurt if they step on it, or make a lot of noise. TEE-HEE
customer_reviews.author: judge

customer_reviews.title: The toy is ok but and works like any other building toys for kids but the biggest ...
customer_reviews.text: The toy is ok but and works like any other building toys for kids but the biggest drawback is it doesnt come with manual how to build it...now imagin a building toy with no manual n only ebook...u either give ur kids ipad whole day with ebook or print colored 90 pages and spend $90 just for that. In addition the box it comes with is too small for all the parts...you have to really struggle to fit all parts and for kids that kind of immpossible. Just not worth.. There are tons of similar toys in market with a manual and better box.
customer_reviews.author: Priya

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 2 1/2 year old, so right now all she does is screw the nuts and bolts together and take the pieces in and out of the box. It's a great toy that keeps her occupied and teaches her to clean up when finished. The adults enjoy creating things also!
customer_reviews.author: 62denise

customer_reviews.title: Hated that an e-book was the only way to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave to a friend for his 3-year-old. Hated that an e-book was the only way to get the projects and such. ETI Toys: spend the money, waste the paper and ink, MAKE A REAL BOOK to give with the set!!
customer_reviews.author: E.L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for grandchildren ...... Our 4 1/2 yr old grandson LOVES this ...... As most know , toddlers attention span it maybe 10 minutes; our grandson was busy for over an hour building and taking his creations apart.... The pieces are " Little Hand " friendly ......
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Our nephews ages 3 and 6 love these. There are endless ways to build and ...
customer_reviews.text: Our nephews ages 3 and 6 love these. There are endless ways to build and create. Great product and customer service. Would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: My First Graders Loved These!
customer_reviews.text: These toys are great to use for an inside recess in your classroom or for some downtime in your classroom when everything is done for the day. My First Graders absolutely loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the learning tool should be very useful with ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the learning tool should be very useful with 2 of my grand children ages 4 and 5 will expect to see more of this type of learning tool/toy in the future from this company would recommend to parents and or grandparents and friends to get ahead of the curve with children wanting to explore how things are made or the curious ones.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry F. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Grandson is really making stuff, need better "put together instructions"
customer_reviews.text: Lots to make, wish the pictures on how to make were a little more instructional, can't figure out how to make truck with wheels, and other vehicles, trying to help my super engineer grandson
customer_reviews.author: Beachwalker

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Def not something a 3 year can do alone.. and even as an adult it takes some time...
customer_reviews.author: Jack R.

customer_reviews.title: Educational and fun !
customer_reviews.text: Such a great toy for children! Anything that forces them to use their minds and creativity is a win. This is a toy they will use for several years. My little one is currently 2 1/2 .Wish the container the pieces come in was a bit bigger- very hard to put pieces away and close it they never fit!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great Building Blocks!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Engineering Building Blocks for our twin grandsons and they love them. They both like to build and stack items and these are great. These are at a great price and I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Darron Preston

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit together correctly like pictures indicate.
customer_reviews.text: This set is junk. The parts are good quality but the wheels don't line up right and there is no way to put the wheels on that allow them to roll. There either isn't enough clearance below or they fit too tightly up against the blocks. The pictures of the things you can build are misleading because some of the peices won't physically fit together like the pictures suggest. Junk toy
customer_reviews.author: lynch mob

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice option for people looking to buy classic building sets ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5-year-old nephew. It has a decent amount of pieces and a ebook with instructions on how to build a few simple models. The blocks are generic shapes that will work well for building. It's a nice option for people looking to buy classic building sets with typical pieces rather than the special themed kits with odd, one-off pieces. It reminds me of being a kid with a big box of assorted pieces that you can do what you want with. We've had a lot of fun building different things. The box looks like it's stackable with other similar style boxes. Overall it's a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Unst

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old and 3 year olds both love creating and building with this set
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old and 3 year olds both love creating and building with this set. A nice change of pace from their Lego sets. It's easy enough for them to use on their own and a great learning toy. My only complaint is that the storage box is too small. Pieces had to be stack back in a certain way like a puzzle or they wouldn't fit. I had to go buy a bigger tub to keep them in.
customer_reviews.author: jame.rame

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, but no instructions!
customer_reviews.text: This is fun to play with, but was a little disappointed with the lack of "how to" documentation. It was pictures of ideas, which I was able to figure out, but for a child, having step by step instructions would have been nice. I understand the whole idea is to "create your own", but most kids need a place to start to get the idea, then go off on their own from there.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T. Helton

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I love playing with this! We build all kids of things! Love the options! My kids are 2 and 4 and they both love using it with minimal assistance.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Stirs creativity, my guys love this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5 year olds and they sat down for hours playing with them. I loved playing with the erector set back in the day, these are far more colorful and have a couple extra items. My guys enjoyed using the 'screwdriver' and making vehicles which they then played with for another hour. Durable, great quality, I'm getting more
customer_reviews.author: R. Heron

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Educational
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my grandson, and he had so much fun making different shapes. Kept him busy for quite a while and I was so impressed with the quality of the pieces and how easy it was for him to handle them. Couldn't be happier with the product because he was so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Jo

customer_reviews.title: Gave this as a birthday gift to my niece she really enjoyed it
customer_reviews.text: My husband was more excited to play with it than my niece. Therefore I can say not just the kids even parents love playing it with the kids. It’s a fun toy for kids to play with parents , it’s a good way to interact with the kids and the same time enjoy creating things out of the provided material. We like it.
customer_reviews.author: pranjali

customer_reviews.title: We love these building blocks
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves building with these. The screws and tools are easy for him to use and he uses his imagination in putting things together. I only wish they came in a larger container as all pieces have to be put away just right to fit. Would recommend for ages 3-5 boy or girl, for sure..
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this toy! I bought this for my 4 year old son for Christmas because he really loves constructing things and building. He gets bored very quickly and enjoys the mental challenge and stimulation of a toy or activity he has to figure out putting together. And this toy fits the requirement! My only regret is not buying a bigger set! But he seems to be very happy with it and constantly looking at the insert with pics of examples to make new creations.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Schuerger

customer_reviews.title: Not
customer_reviews.text: Okay, just because it says STEM, don’t get excited. I ordered this for a six year old. Maybe it was just too many pieces or the fact the packaging lacked good examples. In fact I believe it just all arrived minus anything but pieces. Having taught elementary Ed for many years, there was no order or cleanup method that came with this product, just the brown box. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Krall

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my daughter busy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. They’re really great for getting her creativity going. Unlike blocks, they require more mechanical processes to assemble but not too much for a toddler. Whether you create the examples in the book or invent your own creations, they are definitely a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Grandson love these!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure how my grandson would like these but he can build so much faster than with legos plus they are just different blocks. Easy to put together a "castle" in no time. Gave them at Christmas and he is enjoying them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K

customer_reviews.title: First stages of engineering
customer_reviews.text: I would like to take this opportunity to inform other potential buyers that this toy is more then just a toy it helps in the dexterity learning along with thinking of other possibilities of what it could be. we have recently purchased this item and now my grandson is asking how to make other things out of this. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my 3 year old. He LOVES this set. The pieces are the perfect size for him and he is great with the tools. So many hours have been spent creating different things. Only complaint is that the pieces have to be constantly tightened when playing with them. They come loose very easily, which frustrates my son.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: not enough bolts to create things.the blue wrench doesnt work.some screws dont even fit.theres no guide to create ideas.i cant believe i paid $30 for this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: chris r.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set for the builder in your life!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson, and he loves them, he said he built a dog! he loves legos and has huge waffle blocks for the back yard and just loves to build! Glad I found them. He is five almost six!
customer_reviews.author: SHARON A

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I did not use it for myself, but gave it as an Angel Tree gift. The director of out group, said the young boy loves it, and really enjoying it to the fullest.
customer_reviews.author: LUCY

customer_reviews.title: This was AMAZING for my twins
customer_reviews.text: This was AMAZING for my twins. I had purchased the smaller set and immediately ordered this set the next day. The smaller service is gertrude.gillman@yahoo.com for 1 kid ,this one is easy to share. I love games that make them think and use their imagination!
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Creative
customer_reviews.text: A very good toy for my son. We follow the guide in the start and now me and my son make different robots.
customer_reviews.author: Kb

customer_reviews.title: They are less durable than I would have liked and he has already broken a few pieces just ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves these. They are less durable than I would have liked and he has already broken a few pieces just by screwing the screws into hard. But still has really encouraged his building skills and imagination. We even had a frog in our yard yesterday and he ran in and made a frog out of these so it would have a friend (picture included).
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun for the creative mind
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable, colorful, fun toy, and I have to say having received a copy of the instruction booklet, my grandson is now thoroughly enjoy playing with it. That made all the difference in the world. Step-by-step instructions really help a young mind.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Decent kid toy but kind of a pain to repackage ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent kid toy but kind of a pain to repackage the toy in its container as it the space is tight unless you are a master packer or tetrus guru.
customer_reviews.author: L Capitan

customer_reviews.title: Score
customer_reviews.text: My son received this from nana for an early Christmas gift. It is lots of fun and we have created several things with it. I was a bit surprised how small the box was that it came in, but they have it packed with everything you need to start creating loads of things. And I LOVE that it all has a place to go back to when done!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for my 4yr old
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best toys, my 4 year old keeps buildings stuff, it's like legos, but cheaper and easier for a 4 year old to manage on their own
customer_reviews.author: KASLAKAB

customer_reviews.title: An excellent STEM toy
customer_reviews.text: The 3 year old was able to follow the instructions (pictures) to make his own car with wheels without help (or interference) from the adults. The pieces and tools are large enough for little hands to manipulate. This is an excellent STEM toy.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie  Sink

customer_reviews.title: ... this toy and all of my girls seem to enjoy playing with it as well
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter loves this toy and all of my girls seem to enjoy playing with it as well. (4,6, and 10). Additionally, the pieces are well made. I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DroopyDru

customer_reviews.title: Unparalleled product- unparalleled service.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 101-piece construction set as BD present for turning 4-yr-old grandson. Was an immediate hit...not just with him but also his 6&7 yr-old brothers! They work together on projects, and love what they build. The next day I took him home after daycare. The first thing he did was head to the set, choosing it over his other toys in plain view. The built projects are cool and stimulate play. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MARJORIE L. ELDER

customer_reviews.title: The product is good quality, very study
customer_reviews.text: The product is good quality, very study, very colorful. However for some reason, all three of my sons are not very interested in it. They are one 4 year old and two 6 year old. They played with it for a short while and get bored in 10-15 minutes. (BTW, they can spend hours on legos.)
customer_reviews.author: Reikailu feng

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Pieces dont tightened enough to make the structures durable. Returning
customer_reviews.author: gimpy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set!
customer_reviews.text: Well made set PLUS it works with the Skoolzy set. Four years olds have been using the Skoolzy set for over two years and needed more pieces to build more complicated structures. This is exactly what they needed!
customer_reviews.author: Gaye

customer_reviews.title: It is easy enough for him to build his own creations all ...
customer_reviews.text: My three year old is loving this toy! It is easy enough for him to build his own creations all on his own! The toy is engaging enough that his 7 year old brother and 10 year old sister like to build things with him. The older kids can follow the ideas given in the booklet that is included while the 3 year old just like to connect the pieces together. I love toys that can engage all three of my children even though there are so many years between them. A winner for sure!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! I got it for my 3yr old. He is interested in tighten and loosen the screws. He is not able to assemble a car or helicopter by himself so he lost interest after two days. Hopefully he will like it when he is a little older.
customer_reviews.author: pandaxixi

customer_reviews.title: Great building toy for using gross motor skills.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old grandson enjoys these. He began using the photos from the container to build but quickly reverted to using his own imagination. He thinks the plastic wrenches are pretty cool. He likes these better than the small Legos because this toy doesn't require fine motor skills. Keeps him occupied for at least an hour!
customer_reviews.author: designer label lover

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loves his building blocks and the parents love the carrying case that it comes with. They just wish there was a little more wiggle room to get the pieces back into the box.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Great but for a child that loves to build things
customer_reviews.text: My son loves to take things apart and build stuff. This was the perfect present for him! He loves playing and building all kinds of stuff with this set
customer_reviews.author: jeanette asher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for ADHD Kids
customer_reviews.text: My son stayed for almost an hour on this toy. He has ADHD and this toy keeps him focus. We use it for our Parent-Children Interaction Therapy and even myself love this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: 3 and 4 yr old and they both love playing with this set
customer_reviews.text: I have two children. A boy and girl... 3 and 4 yr old and they both love playing with this set. I always like when pictures are included to help spark building ideas. The only thing I would change is a larger box. It's almost impossible to get all the pieces back in the lid on.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $
customer_reviews.text: Not enough to pieces to put more than one of their “models” together. Not as engaging as I thought
customer_reviews.author: Amazonia

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with this product, would purchase again. Great to give out as gifts or rewards to kids in a class room!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for 4-5yr old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for 4-5yr old...nice box packaging...keeps the kids busy and learning at the same time
customer_reviews.author: Lizeth Verma

customer_reviews.title: Great building toy
customer_reviews.text: This a great building toy with a good selection of colorful blocks and a variety of shapes and sizes. It includes a plastic bin to store the pieces when not in use. Also includes an online booklet with great building ideas. I bought this toy for my two daughters but their younger 2 yr old brother loves it just as much. He's been busy creating vehicles and loving it! It's kept the kids playing together for hours. Can't go wrong with this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Toy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our two year old grandson, and am so glad we did. Both he and his four year old brother have a lot of fun making things. I got a Skype call the other day, the boys wanted to show me their Noah's ark! It was so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Turner

customer_reviews.title: ... gift for my 4-year-old grandson's birthday and he absolutely loved it! We all had fun building different things ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 4-year-old grandson's birthday and he absolutely loved it! We all had fun building different things after the party was over. I would highly recommend this for age 3+. His mom is a teacher and she loved it too!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stem toy but what you get for the price is a little underwhelming. Great for all ages and the pieces are big enough that I’m not so scared of it being a choking hazard for the baby who wants to see everything his brothers are doing.
customer_reviews.author: Sadia Y

customer_reviews.title: Alot of fun for little builders
customer_reviews.text: I like that it come with a small wratchet my kids love to use that. Its really quick to build and take apart so you can make things fast play til the come apart then rebuild them quickly.
customer_reviews.author: 802Kmighty

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my 7yr old and 5 yr ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7yr old and 5 yr Grandsons.It does not hold their interest for very long.Maybe later on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got to build a card with him also and it was perfect. He loves to make things
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this item for my grandsons third birthday and it was a big hit. I got to build a card with him also and it was perfect. He loves to make things, put them together and take apart. The instruction booklet that I received was also very helpful. I do have one recommendation; the pieces all came with a great storage container but all of the pieces wouldn't fit back in the container after playtime and creations were taken apart. Just a suggestion to make it a little bigger, otherwise I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Watson

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my 3 yo grandson and he and his sister loved playing with it. We all sat down on the carpet and had a wonderful time building together and giggling. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Stacey G

customer_reviews.title: Great wuality
customer_reviews.text: Bough this set for my preschool classroom and my kids love it. I love how sturdy and durable the pieces are. They will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jess D

customer_reviews.title: Creative fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun and creative. The only.cimplaint is that the storage box is so small that you have to stack them perfectly or they don't fit. Most 3 year olds don't stack perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jenbc23

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Learning Toy
customer_reviews.text: Hallelujah! What a wonderful idea my wife had to buy this toy right before Thanksgiving! This is an amazing toy and my kids love the building blocks. This is perfect for my inquisitive kids! They have been playing it for hours and I am off to brining that Turkey. This would make a perfect holiday present. I also love the instructions eBook it comes with!Thank you ETI toys
customer_reviews.author: MANSOOR KHAWAJA

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: 5 year old grandson will play with this for hours. Well worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Edwards

customer_reviews.title: My 4 and 2 year old love to build robots and cars with this
customer_reviews.text: My 4 and 2 year old love to build robots and cars with this! I just wish the container was a little bit bigger because the only way I can get everything to fit after use is if I spend 3-5 mins organizing it
customer_reviews.author: taryn

customer_reviews.title: Does not have 101 pieces in it there’s no way ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not have 101 pieces in it there’s no way to little of a box and not big enough pieces for a 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia

customer_reviews.title: This product makes learning fun
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 Yr old grandson loves them. We built the frog and the duck following the parts list and step by step illustration. He got the hang of it very quickly. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: John & Sarah H - Summerville SC

customer_reviews.title: Great toy but container way too small
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy for my 3 year old. However the container it came in barely fits all the many small parts. It’s unreasonable for a 3 year old to put all the pieces back in just right for it all to fit. Kinda frustrating for easy cleanup. Otherwise I would definitely recommend this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Fun but wish book was included
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves it. I don't like that I had to find the building book online - it's 84 pages so I'm not printing it. Which means every time he wants to build I then have to take out my tablet for him to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn Wilks-Muth

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the product design, look and feel. The assembling is easy, my 3 year old kid is able to assemble by looking at the instructions easily. My only improvement suggestion would be to make the design of the bolts bit better, as sometimes they get really tight and it’s difficult to disengage with your bare hands.
customer_reviews.author: Old trafford

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tools and toy!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully made. Solid plastic tools! Great for little hands. Thoughtfully designed and organized!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Says

customer_reviews.title: Awesome STEM Learning
customer_reviews.text: My son is 3 and he has already re-created the images on the box! He loves designing & building from scratch however, it's fun for him to refer to his "blueprint". I know they will definitely set him up for success in STEM . Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.author: Melody Lyrics

product_meta.title: ETI Toys | STEM Learning | Original 101 Piece Educational Construction Engineering Building Blocks Set for 3, 4 and 5+ Year Old Boys & Girls | Creative Fun Kit | Best Toy Gift for Kids Ages 3yr - 6yr
feature_bullets: ►​ YOUR CHILD DESERVES A MORE PRODUCTIVE ACTIVITY than video games, phones and tablets. STEM supported Engineering Blocks are built to develop your child’s Science, Technology, Engineering and Math skills. Challenge your kids to build ​creative designs, trucks, ​transformers​, helicopters, robots and much more! For​ boys and ​girls age ​3 through​ 6+ years​,​ designed to support your child’s creativity as they grow.

►​ GIFT A TOY THAT IS FUN AND EDUCATIONAL. We believe in making ​toys that are both fun and educational. This 101-piece ​gift idea ​set will help kids build fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination and enhance creativity while keeping them entertained for hours! Which means more time for mom and dad! Supports logical thinking and problem solving, unleashing your child’s imagination to endless possibilities.

►​ HELP YOUR CHILD BUILD SOCIAL SKILLS AT AN EARLY AGE​. Social development, teamwork and collaboration are critical to success in today's world. Engineering blocks are designed to develop your child’s social skills from an early age. Encourages children to work together as a team to build awesome creations and comes with two dual-purpose ‘clicking’ wrenches to help support interactive play.

►​ STEP BY STEP EBOOK WITH 12 FUN TOY DESIGNS​! Toys should offer quick and hassle-free cleanup for both parents and kids. That’s why our STEM Engineering blocks are washable (to keep germs at bay) and come with their own easy to carry storage tub. ​Each set also includes an exclusive 80 page step-by-step instructional eBook with 12 different ​toy designs for Easy, Intermediate, and Advanced levels.

►​ YOUR CHILD’S SAFETY IS PARAMOUNT TO US. Engineering Blocks are exhaustively and Independently Third-Party Lab Tested and Certified. Our Engineering​ Learning Set​ is BPA-Safe, Lead-Safe and Phthalates-Safe.
